title: Please ID this Rustic Typeface
content:
Any ideas what this could be? Or know of anything that has some similar features?

TIA =)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Indian-Font.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710142939/http:/typophile.com/files/Indian-Font.gif) | 3.45 KB |
author: SunnyGosal

comments.content: Looks to me like a really rough kind of uncial font (not quite sure that is what they are really called in english, though). Check out these for size: [http://new.myfonts.com/search/uncial/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710142939/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/uncial/fonts/)

Thanks Shockomotive!  
I searched DaFont for Uncial fonts, and got some very similar results.  
I really appreciate your help =)

Here's what I will most likely be using:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/cry-uncial.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710142939/http:/www.dafont.com/cry-uncial.font "http://www.dafont.com/cry-uncial.font")
